name: Unlock Together (GMTK GameJam 2021)
description:
You're hidden in a bunker all alone for a few days during an apocalypse  when you suddenly hear a digging sound. Meet your new friend and unlock your way back outdoors together!

How to play:

  • You need BOTH characters to go through the gate together. (We didn't have the time to implement detecting both characters so there is a bug where you can just go through alone as Human and makes it too easy).
  • 'R' to switch the character
  • 'F' to interact / Dig Use the buttons to unlock door
  • Pick up the key
  • 'Q' to drop the key
  • The dog can't interact with the ladder and the door. So as the dog, you need to drop the key for the player.

Everything was created within 28 hours. 

The game isn't as polished as we wanted and we couldn't add a lot of extra nice touches, but we had to ship it regardless :)
